ygData.subject: Re: Well tiime to get POed pottery buffs....
ygData.msgSnippet: heh...made a point of not mentioning anywhere that i could hit 80pp an hour for just that reason... oh well...had to expect it sometime after they did it to
ygData.messageBody:
heh...made a point of not mentioning anywhere that i could hit 80pp an hour
for just that reason...
oh well...had to expect it sometime after they did it to brewing....

Xillitil/povar


>From: "Jeffrey Kovach" <jkovach@...>
>
>I witnessed the demise of pottery in the EQ General Chat channel.
>
>I dropped in there on Thursday night, and Aradune (Brad) was there.
>Someone
>asked
>something like "What can you do in the game to make money?" and some idiot
>replied
>to him "I make 80p per day with pottery". A few moments later Aradune said
>"80p per day???".
>After that nothing more about pottery was said.
>
>And now we have the patch, cuz some idiot couldn't keep his trap shut. The
>link between
>this incident and the patch is quite clear.
>
